page.title: 14Post office
page.content:
{ Mrs Nicholls}is the village{Post {Mistress.}She lives in the{post {office}with her family.
She has been living in{Upton Noble for 27 years. When she first came here the{post office}was opposite the {school}but for the last 17 years it has been opposite the{church.}
She has not noticed any changes except for{houses}being built. This she thinks is not for the better because she does not want the{village to change.
There is no{shop}that sells{ {groceries}in{Upton Noble.}Mrs Nichols used to stock food but people now prefer to travel to the{towns}to buy their{shopping.
